description: This Java class JwtTokenService provides functionality for generating and validating JSON Web Tokens (JWT) in a backend application, including handling secret keys and token expiration based on configurable properties.

classes.name: JwtTokenService
classes.description: This class manages the creation and validation of JWT tokens, utilizing a secret key and TTL configurations injected via Spring's @Value annotation.

methods.name: generateToken
methods.description: Generates a signed JWT token containing the username as the subject, with an expiration time based on the configured TTL.

methods.name: validateAndGetSubject
methods.description: Validates the provided JWT token and retrieves the subject (username) if valid; throws JwtException if invalid.
